cast.overview: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.
cast.title: GoodFellas

details.biography: Lisa D’Apolito is an American film producer and director. She started her career in the entertainment industry as an actress, including a part in the 1990 film GoodFellas. She then went on to producing and directing in advertising, making her way to SVP/EP of production at FCB. In 2012, she started her own film production company, 3 Faces Films.
details.name: Lisa D’Apolito
